item.title: An Intro
item.description: For a full introduction, reference this Paper Document.

item.title: Article Cards
item.description: Article Cards SASS Partial: components/article-card Hugo Partial: partials/components/article-card Grid <div class="article-cards | xs:flex-grid"> </div> Insights His Passion for WeWork Drove His Vision for Social Change Insights His Passion for WeWork Drove His Vision for Social Change <div class="article-cards | xs:flex-grid"> <a class="article-card" href="/stories-article"> <div class="article-card__content"> <figure class="article-card__figure | image -is16x9"> <img alt="" class="fit-cover" src="/dist/assets/img/fpo-10.jpg"> </figure> <div class="article-card__main"> <h2 class="preheader | header-sm">Insights</h2> <h2 class="header | header-md">His Passion for WeWork Drove His Vision for Social Change</h2> </div> </div> </a> <a class="article-card" href="/stories-article"> <div class="article-card__content"> <figure class="article-card__figure | image -is16x9"> <img alt="" class="fit-cover" src="/dist/assets/img/fpo-10.

item.title: Article Content
item.description: Article Content SASS Partial: components/article-content Section Heading (H5) Created with a simple aspiration (h2) We approached this mission with a deep understanding of the sector – Founders Pledge was built by founders, for founders and launched out of Founders Forum, Europe's foremost network of digital and technology entrepreneurs. We're empowering founders and investors to add value to their companies as well as the causes they love, without sacrificing one for the other.

item.title: Author Card
item.description: Author Card SASS Partial: components/author-card Paul Smith Author Lorem ipsum dolor, sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Rem obcaecati qui non hic nihil accusantium vitae totam, nam nulla optio quas ut incidunt ipsa, reprehenderit veritatis placeat amet minima fugit? <div class="author-card | md:flex-grid"> <div class="author-card__aside"> <figure class="image -is1x1 | mb-4"> <img src="/dist/assets/img/fpo-10.jpg" class="fit-cover" /> </figure> </div> <div class="author-card__main"> <div class="author-card__header | mb-5 pt-2"> <h4 class="header-md">Paul Smith</h4> <h5 class="header-sm | pt-2">Author</h5> </div> <div class="author-card__descr | paragraphs -sm"> <p> Lorem ipsum dolor, sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.

item.title: Blockquote
item.description: Blockquote SASS Partial: base/blockquote "I’m excited to be able to contribute to a community of founders who are thinking critically about their giving. Together I believe we can achieve a huge amount of good." Miguel Mckelvey Founder & CEO <blockquote class="blockquote | md:pt-10"> <h3 class="blockquote__quote | mb-8 md:mb-10"> "I’m excited to be able to contribute to a community of founders who are thinking critically about their giving.

item.title: Buttons
item.description: — Buttons SASS Partial: base/button Standard Standard <a href="#" class="btn">Standard</a> Wide Light <a href="#" class="btn -light">Light</a> Solid Solid <a href="#" class="btn -solid">Solid</a> Small Small <a href="#" class="btn -small">Small</a> Add The add button should be paired with the -dark -small variations Add <a href="#" class="btn -add -dark -small">Add</a> Wide Wide <a href="#" class="btn -wide">Wide</a> Full Full <a href="#" class="btn -full">Full</a> Gallery Button Browse event gallery <div class="btn--gallery"> <div class="gallery-stack"> <div class="gallery-stack__item"> <img src="/dist/assets/img/fpo-03.

item.title: Definition List
item.description: Definition List SASS Partial: components/definition-list Published March 2017 Written By Jane Smith <dl class="definition-list"> <dt>Published</dt> <dd>March 2017</dd> <dt>Written By</dt> <dd>Jane Smith</dd> </dl>

item.title: Featured Article Card
item.description: Featured Article Card SASS Partial: components/featured-article-card Related SASS Partial: components/link-card Hugo Partial: components/featured-article-card Impact Journey Story Title Here Will Break to Second Row If Lengthy Our operations are fully funded by a small group of essential donors and institutions. This means we can support impactful giving at zero cost. Simple, transparent, and effective. <a class="featured-article-card | link-card -dark -lg--l | container -flush | block" href="#"> <div class="featured-article-card__content"> <figure class="featured-article-card__figure | image -background -is3x2"> <div class="background" style="background-image: url('/dist/assets/img/fpo-09.

item.title: Featured Articles
item.description: Featured Articles SASS Partial: components/featured-article Grid <div class="featured-articles | md:flex-grid container gutter"> <div class="feature-article | md:w-1/2"> </div> <div class="feature-article | md:w-1/2"> </div> </div> Featured Article Powered by Visionaries Zero Cuts Zero Fees 100% Impact Our operations are fully funded by a small group of essential donors and institutions. This means we can support impactful giving at zero cost. Simple, transparent, and effective. Learn More <div class="feature-article"> <div class="feature-article__content | text-center"> <div class="feature-article__main"> <h2 class="header-lg | mb-4">Powered by Visionaries</h2> <h4 class="subheader text-orange"><span class="ornament-breadcrumb">Zero Cuts</span> <span class="ornament-breadcrumb">Zero Fees</span> <span class="ornament-breadcrumb">100% Impact</span></h4> <div class="paragraphs | mt-8"> <p>Our operations are fully funded by a small group of essential donors and institutions.

item.title: Flip Cards
item.description: Flip Card SASS Partial: components/flip-card Hugo Partial: components/flip-card Variations include: -resource -press -features -cta Flip Card Grid <div class="flip-cards | md:flex-grid justify-between | container gutter-md"> <div class="flip-card -press"> … </div> <div class="flip-card -press"> … </div> </div> Press “enables budding tycoons to donate a percentage of their future earnings to good causes, once they sell or list their businesses.” Read full article <div class="flip-card -press"> <div class="flip-card__content"> <div class="flip-card__back"> <div class="flip-card__main"> <div class="flip-card__descr | paragraphs -xs"> <p>“enables budding tycoons to donate a percentage of their future earnings to good causes, once they sell or list their businesses.

item.title: Form - Base
item.description: Form Base SASS Partial: standard-form-base Related SASS Partials: checkbox-radio Related SASS Partials: vendor/choices Description: This is the base for standard forms. The core elements are: Basics .form-group: Sets a flexbox grid and x-axis margins .field-group: Contains the form elements directly and can be set to a width to create a column layout. .standard-label: The input label, which is set absolutely relative to the .form-group so they appear to float in the input field.

item.title: Form - Select Field
item.description: Select Field Base SASS Partial: vendor/choices Related SASS Partial: standard-form-base Description: This is a Vue component that uses Vue Properties to set the variant classes. Check out the Select Field for all variant styles. Default Germany United States of America France Spain Italy <select_box :opt="{ variant: '' }"> <option value="es" selected>Germany</option> <option value="en">United States of America</option> <option value="ma">France</option> <option value="de">Spain</option> <option value="fr">Italy</option> </select_box> Default Dark Germany United States of America France Spain Italy <select_box :opt="{ variant: '-dark' }"> <option value="es" selected>Germany</option> <option value="en">United States of America</option> <option value="ma">France</option> <option value="de">Spain</option> <option value="fr">Italy</option> </select_box> Default Center Germany United States of America France Spain Italy <select_box :opt="{ variant: '-center' }"> <option value="es" selected>Germany</option> <option value="en">United States of America</option> <option value="ma">France</option> <option value="de">Spain</option> <option value="fr">Italy</option> </select_box> Default Dark Center Germany United States of America France Spain Italy <select_box :opt="{ variant: '-dark -center' }"> <option value="es" selected>Germany</option> <option value="en">United States of America</option> <option value="ma">France</option> <option value="de">Spain</option> <option value="fr">Italy</option> </select_box> Standard Styled to match the Standard Form Base

item.title: Highlight Cards
item.description: Highlight Cards SASS Partial: components/highlight-card Hugo Partial: components/highlight-card Highlight Card Grid highlight-cards | md:flex-grid container lg:gutter | md:pb-0 pb-4 <div class="highlight-card"> … </div> <div class="highlight-card"> … </div> </div> Highlight Card Community Form lasting bonds with value-aligned entrepreneurs, tackle some of the world’s toughest challenges, and learn experts at our intimate events around the globe. Learn More <div class="highlight-card"> <div class="highlight-card__content"> <div class="highlight-card__icon | text-green"> <span class="icon | icon--arrow -md"><svg viewbox="0 0 13 39" xmlns="http://www.

item.title: Image
item.description: — Image SASS Partial: base/image Ratio 1x1 <figure class="image -is1x1"> <img src="{$path}"> </figure> Ratio 12x16 <figure class="image -is12x16"> <img src="{$path}"> </figure> Ratio 8x20 <figure class="image -is8x20"> <img src="{$path}"> </figure> Ratio 8x10 <figure class="image -is8x10"> <img src="{$path}"> </figure> Ratio 16x12 <figure class="image -is16x12"> <img src="{$path}"> </figure> Ratio 16x9 <figure class="image -is16x9"> <img src="{$path}"> </figure> Ratio 2x1 <figure class="image -is2x1"> <img src="{$path}"> </figure> Ratio 3x2 <figure class="image -is3x2"> <img src="{$path}"> </figure> Fit: Cover <figure class="image -is3x2"> <img src="{$path}" class="fit-cover"> </figure> Fit: Contain <figure class="image -is3x2"> <img src="{$path}" class="fit-contain"> </figure> Inner Shadow <figure class="image -is3x2 -inner-shadow"> <img src="{$path}"> </figure> Rounded + Shadow <figure class="image -is3x2 -inner-shadow | rounded-full"> <img src="{$path}"> </figure>

item.title: Links
item.description: — Links SASS Partial: base/link Standard Read More <a href="#" class="link">Read More</a> Small Read More <a href="#" class="link -sm">Read More</a> Green Read More <a href="#" class="link -green">Read More</a> Dark Reset the default for nested links that inherit unwanted styles from their parent Read More <a href="#" class="link -dark">Read More</a> Icon Download <button class="link -icon -green -sm"> <span class="text">Download</span><span class="icon | icon--arrow -xs -stroke-4"><svg xmlns="http://www.

item.title: Logo List
Modal - Content
item.description: Content Modal SASS Partial: components/content-modal Modal Base Styles: base/modal Vue Component JS: src/js/components/ContentModal.vue Description: This is a Vue component that uses Template Slots, meaning you can swap out content easily right in the HTML markup. You can use anything to trigger the modal using the Trigger Slot. Resources: Vue Slots Review & Sign Thank you! Your pledge has been successfully sent. I can’t thank you enough for your support.

item.title: Modal - Profile
item.description: Profile Modal SASS Partial: components/profile-modal Hugo Partial: components/profile-card--modal Modal Base Styles: base/modal Vue Component JS: src/js/components/ProfileModal.vue Description: This is a Vue component that uses Template Slots, meaning you can swap out content easily right in the HTML markup. You can use anything to trigger the modal using the Trigger Slot. Resources: Vue Slots Lauren Bacall Actress Lauren Bacall Actress Miguel directs all architecture, design, and construction activities at WeWork.

item.title: Page Menu
item.description: Page Menu SASS Partial: components/page-menu Hugo Partial: components/page-menu Related: js/components/SmoothScroll.vue Description: This pattern uses the smooth_scroll Vue component which includes Option Properties that allow you to set the page anchor and top offset For each section in the page, add .js-section. This enables the active states in the menu to update automatically on scroll. Variations -neg-offset -align-right Section Header Section Header Section Header Section Header <nav class="page-menu | gutter "> <ul class="page-menu__bar menu-bar"> <li class="page-menu__item"> <smooth_scroll class="link" :anchor="'section-1'" :offset="120" >Section Header</smooth_scroll > </li> <li class="page-menu__item"> <smooth_scroll class="link" :anchor="'section-2'" :offset="120" >Section Header</smooth_scroll > </li> <li class="page-menu__item"> <smooth_scroll class="link" :anchor="'section-1'" :offset="120" >Section Header</smooth_scroll > </li> <li class="page-menu__item"> <smooth_scroll class="link" :anchor="'section-2'" :offset="120" >Section Header</smooth_scroll > </li> </ul> </nav>

item.title: Panel Hero
item.description: Panel Hero SASS Partial: components/panel-hero Hugo Partial: components/panel-hero Description: Optional child elements include: Description You're Fantastic Descriptive bit of copy, because we can. Register Now <header class="panel-hero"> <h2 class="header-lg | mb-4">You're Fantastic</h2> <div class="panel-hero__descr | paragraphs"> Descriptive bit of copy, because we can. </div> <div class="panel-hero__action | pt-8"> <a href="#" class="btn -wide">Register Now</a> </div> </header> Panel Hero Dark You're Fantastic Descriptive bit of copy, because we can.

item.title: Profile Slider
item.description: Profile Slider SASS Partial: components/profile-slider Related SASS Partial: components/slider Hugo Partial: components/profile-slider Vue Component: components/FullSlider Vue Component JS: src/js/components/ProfileModal.vue Description: This is a Vue component that uses Template Slots, meaning you can swap out content easily right in the HTML markup. Resources: Vue Slots "I’m excited to be able to contribute to a community of founders who are thinking critically about their giving. Together I believe we can achieve a huge amount of good.

item.title: Range
item.description: Range Slider SASS Partial: components/rang Vue Component JS: src/js/components/Range.vue Description: This is a Vue component that uses Properties to configure the range start, min, and max options. The content on either side is set in the component file itself. Resources: Vue Slots <range_slider :min="10" :start="40" :max="100" class="form-block"> </range_slider>

item.title: Resource List
item.description: Resource List SASS Partial: components/resource-list Hugo Partial: components/resource Events Coordinator London, UK See details Key Relationships Manager New York City, USA Download Key Relationships Manager San Francisco, USA Download <div class="resources"> <div class="resource__item"> <a class="resource__content | no-underline" href="#"> <div class="resource__main"> <div class="resource__descr"> <h2 class="header | header-lg-2 mb-2 md:mb-0 | text-green-darkest">Events Coordinator</h2> <h4 class="header-sm">London, UK</h4> </div> <div class="resource__action"> <button class="link -icon -green -sm"><span class="text">See details</span><span class="icon | icon--arrow -xs -stroke-4"><svg viewbox="0 0 13 39" xmlns="http://www.

item.title: Section Header
item.description: Section Header SASS Partial: components/section-header Hugo Partials: components/section-header--arrow.html components/section-header--button-group.html components/section-header--basic.html components/section-header.html Notes: Optional child elements include: Preheader Description Link Preheader Primary Title Descriptive paragraph. Optional Link <header class="section-header"> <div class="section-header__content"> <h4 class="header-sm">Preheader</h4> <h2 class="header | header-lg">Primary Title</h2> <div class="section-header__descr | paragraphs"> <p>Descriptive paragraph. </div> <div class="section-header__action"> <a href="#" class="link -underline">Optional Link</a> </div> </div> </header> Top Preheader Primary Title Descriptive paragraph.

item.title: Spacing
item.description: — Spacing SASS Partial: base/space Top Bottom of preceeding sibling Spaced Element <div class="space-t"></div> Top Small Bottom of preceeding sibling Spaced Element <div class="space-t--sm"></div> Top Large Bottom of preceeding sibling Spaced Element <div class="space-t--lg"></div> Bottom Spaced Element Bottom of proceeding sibling <div class="space-b"></div> Bottom Small Spaced Element Bottom of proceeding sibling <div class="space-b--sm"></div> Bottom Large Spaced Element Bottom of proceeding sibling <div class="space-b--lg"></div>

item.title: Stat Cards
item.description: Stat Cards SASS Partial: components/stat-card Description: This is a Vue component that uses Template Slots, meaning you can swap out content easily right in the HTML markup. Resources: Vue Slots Ambitious 33% A third for you and family, a third for the world and a third for that third thing in your life (travel, angel investing, wacky experiment). <stat_card :active="true"> <template slot="header"> <h4 class="header | header-md">Ambitious</h4> <h3 class="figure | header-xl | font-integer">33%</h3> </template> <template slot="descr"> <div class="stat-card__descr paragraphs -xs"> <p>A third for you and family, a third for the world and a third for that third thing in your life (travel, angel investing, wacky experiment).

item.title: Status List
item.description: Status List SASS Partial: components/status-list Green $13,000.00 for Clean Air Task Force COMPLETED MONTH DD, YYYY <div class="status-list"> <div class="status border-green"> <div class="status__content"> <h3 class="header-lg-2 | mb-2">$13,000.00 for Clean Air Task Force</h3> <h5 class="header-sm -grey | current-status">COMPLETED MONTH DD, YYYY</h5> </div> </div> </div> Orange $13,000.00 for Clean Air Task Force COMPLETED MONTH DD, YYYY <div class="status-list"> <div class="status border-orange"> <div class="status__content"> <h3 class="header-lg-2 | mb-2">$13,000.

item.title: Sub Section Header
item.description: Sub Section Header SASS Partial: components/sub-section-header Tell Us About Yourself <header class="sub-section-header mx-2"> <h2 class="header-md">Tell Us About Yourself</h2> </header>

item.title: Toggle Text
item.description: Toggle Text SASS Partial: base/toggle-text Description: Use CSS pseudo content to toggle based on data attributes. by deafult, the content of the data-default attribute is displayed. To show the data-active content instead, add the -active variation to the parent toggle-text div. Once toggle-text is added to a parent div, all of the child toggle-text__text elements will toggle according to the variation class Inactive State: <div class="toggle-text"> <span class="toggle-text__text" data-default="Learn More" data-active="Less"></span> </div> Active State: <div class="toggle-text -active"> <span class="toggle-text__text" data-default="Learn More" data-active="Less"></span> </div>

item.title: Typography
item.description: — Typography Headers, paragraphs, and basic links. SASS Partial: base/typography Header XL Philanthropy <h2 class="header-xl">Philanthropy</h2> Header XL 2 Philanthropy <h2 class="header-xl-2">Philanthropy</h2> Header Lg Philanthropy <h2 class="header-lg">Philanthropy</h2> Header Lg 2 Philanthropy <h2 class="header-lg-2">Philanthropy</h2> Header Md Philanthropy <h2 class="header-md">Philanthropy</h2> Header Sm Philanthropy <h2 class="header-sm">Philanthropy</h2> Header Sm -light Philanthropy <h2 class="header-sm -light">Philanthropy</h2> Header Sm -dark Philanthropy <h2 class="header-sm -dark">Philanthropy</h2> Header Sm -grey Philanthropy <h2 class="header-sm -grey">Philanthropy</h2> Header Sm -white Philanthropy <h2 class="header-sm -white">Philanthropy</h2> Paragraphs Providing expert research, guidance, and educational events, we empower entrepreneurs to maximize their impact.
